description: A paginated call to retrieve a list of billing groups for the given billing period. If you don't provide a billing group, the current billing period is used.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ListBillingGroupsFilter that specifies the billing group and pricing plan to retrieve billing group information. Arns (list) --- The list of billing group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information. (string) --- PricingPlan (string) --- The pricing plan Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information. Statuses (list) --- A list of billing groups to retrieve their current status for a specific time range (string) --- AutoAssociate (boolean) --- Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.

nested_params.name: Arns
nested_params.description: The list of billing group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information.

nested_params.name: PricingPlan
nested_params.description: The pricing plan Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information.

nested_params.name: Statuses
nested_params.description: A list of billing groups to retrieve their current status for a specific time range.

nested_params.name: AutoAssociate
nested_params.description: Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the billing group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the billing group.

nested_items.name: PrimaryAccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID that serves as the main account in a billing group.

nested_items.name: ComputationPreference
nested_items.description: The preferences and settings that will be used to compute the Amazon Web Services charges for a billing group.

nested_items.name: PricingPlanArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan that's used to compute the Amazon Web Services charges for a billing group.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The number of accounts in the particular billing group.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the billing group was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the billing group was modified.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The billing group status. Only one of the valid values can be used.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the billing group is in its current status.

nested_items.name: AccountGrouping
nested_items.description: Specifies if the billing group has automatic account association ( AutoAssociate) enabled.

nested_items.name: AutoAssociate
nested_items.description: Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get billing groups.
